    • TransactionLockRequest

      public TransactionLockRequest​(NetworkParameters params, byte[] payload, int offset) throws ProtocolException
      Creates a transaction by reading payload starting from offset bytes in. Length of a transaction is fixed.
      Throws:
      ProtocolException

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString​(@Nullable AbstractBlockChain chain)
      Creates a transaction by reading payload starting from offset bytes in. Length of a transaction is fixed.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Transaction
      Parameters:
      chain - If provided, will be used to estimate lock times (if set). Can be null.
